game_description: MotoX is an motocross/motorcycle racing game where players are immersed in the speed, danger, and adrenaline of a virtual Motocross experience. KEY FEATURES: - 1st Person Racing - 3rd Person Racing - Time Trail Leaderboard - High-speed racing - Clear Death-defying stunts - Dodge Obstacles - Comfort controls
review_1: So i bought the game i think 2-3 months ago and it was for me too unrealistic and i got motion sickness so i did a refund 2-3 months later i saw that the game updated and it lookes pretty nice so i gave it a Chance again and it was way better and much realistic!
review_2: I love how much the creators put in to the game I've played since July of 2022 and it is my favorite can't afford a dirt bike in real life so this is nice to have for me follow on tik tok since day one love the game keep up the great work.
review_3: Such a good game with realistic graphics and updates lots it’s so fun and it’s so cheep to get for how good it is This is a must have vr game
review_4: Before the new beta the game wasn’t that good, a great concept nevertheless, but now with the new recent beta this game has exceeded my expectations.The whips feel smooth and natural, cornering is super fun, overall a really great experience.The devs have mentioned multiplayer is coming which for me is a game changer and will really make this the mx bikes of vr
review_5: Just played with the new update some of the jumps are so big you can do a 360 backflip enjoy this game for its cheap price because it deserves to go up
